summary: Environment Mapped Imperial Heavy Armor for Skyrim. Part of the SkyRealism - Shiny project.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/30959-1-1364630157.png[/img]
[center][i]Environment Mapped Imperial Heavy Armor for Skyrim[/i][/center][center][i][color=black]by MTichenor[/color][/i][/center]
[heading][b]Description[/b][/heading]This is the first texture pack in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33532]SkyRealism - Shiny[/url] armor retexture project.

One thing that annoyed me greatly was hearing the Stormcloaks saying how the Imperial armor looked so shiny, when it wasn't shiny at all. So, I've redone the imperial heavy armor to make it look "Fresh from the forge".

I appreciate comments, especially suggestions about how I can make this look better. I'm new to texturing (this is the first time I've ever done it), and I'm always looking to improve.

Enjoy.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33532-1-1364618398.jpg[/img]
author: MTichenor
